data.name: Sound FX: Cinematic Hits and Transitions
data.detailed_description: Cinematic Hits & Transitions features cinematic, epic, heavy, impacts and hits + 100 scary, haunting, transitions and movements. Ideal for your movie and game trailers! Includes 220 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.
data.about_the_game: Cinematic Hits & Transitions features cinematic, epic, heavy, impacts and hits + 100 scary, haunting, transitions and movements. Ideal for your movie and game trailers! Includes 220 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.
data.short_description: Cinematic Hits & Transitions features cinematic, epic, heavy, impacts and hits + 100 scary, haunting, transitions and movements. Ideal for your movie and game trailers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1 or Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Connection required for downloads

data.legal_notice:
*Cakewalk Loop Manager is designed and tested to be compatible with STEAM installations of Music Creator and SONAR. Other SONAR or Music Creator configurations/installations are not officially supported.
**Cakewalk Loop Manager should be installed to the same STEAM Library that you have Music Creator and/or SONAR installed to for proper operation.
***Cakewalk Loop Manager does not need Music Creator or SONAR installed to be utilized.
